mapper.insert: INSERT INTO his.bill (bill_actual_sum, bill_sum, bill_type, bill_register_id, bill_prescription_id, bill_medical_skill_id, bill_user_id) VALUES (#{bill_actual_sum}, #{bill_sum}, #{bill_type}, #{bill_register_id}, #{bill_prescription_id}, #{bill_medical_skill_id}, #{bill_user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bill WHERE bill_prescription_id = #{bill_prescription_id} ORDER BY bill_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
